titles.title: Servicemembersâ€™ Credit Monitoring Enhancement Act
A bill to amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to expand the definition of an active duty military consumer for purposes of certain credit monitoring requirements, and for other purposes.
Servicemembersâ€™ Credit Monitoring Enhancement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of amendment in the nature of a substitute

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Servicemembers' Credit Monitoring Enhancement Act
This bill makes available to uniformed service members free electronic credit monitoring that is currently available to active duty service members.
